verses.name: Deuteronomy 21:9
verses.text: So shalt thou put away the guilt of innocent blood from among you, when thou shalt do that which is right in the sight of the Lord.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 21:10
verses.text: When thou goest forth to war against thine enemies, and the Lord thy God hath delivered them into thine hands, and thou hast taken them captive,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 21:11
verses.text: And seest among the captives a beautiful woman, and hast a desire unto her, that thou wouldest have her to thy wife;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 21:12
verses.text: Then thou shalt bring her home to thine house; and she shall shave her head, and pare her nails;
